body:
Comment 2: 
It's not obvious what the right thing to do here. Those failures are tests that expect
to only run once (e.g. because they mutate a global). We could change the tests to be
immune to that, but in some cases that would also require changes to their packages.

Perhaps the -cpu flag should result in the test binary being invoked as a subprocess
afresh for each value.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
